title: Calculus I: Limits & Derivatives
summary: Start calculus from first principles: limits, derivative definition, and core rules with applications. Includes images and video embeds.

lessons.title: What is a Limit? (with media)
lessons.contentHTML:
Idea

The limit of f(x) as x approaches a means: what value does f(x) get close to?

Video: Intro to Limits
A conceptual graph illustration.

Try: lim_{{x→2}} (x^2-4)/(x-2)

title: Lumeran Translation Practice I
summary: Fifty English phrases grouped by level for learners to translate into Lumeran. Designed to build fluency, recall, and intuition for Lumeran grammar and vocabulary.

lessons.title: Translate These Everyday Phrases
lessons.contentHTML:
1. I am Lumeran.
  2. You are my friend.
  3. The sun is bright.
  4. We live together.
  5. This is my home.
  6. The water is clean.
  7. I see you.
  8. Peace to you.
  9. Love grows here.
  10. The night is quiet.
üìù Write each sentence in Lumeran below each line in your notes or portal input area.

lessons.title: Translate These Descriptive Phrases
lessons.contentHTML:
1. The air feels alive.
  2. Our hearts are strong.
  3. The garden blooms beautifully.
  4. I dream of a brighter world.
  5. They speak with courage.
  6. Life flows like a river.
  7. The light awakens us.
  8. Silence teaches wisdom.
  9. The stars remember our ancestors.
  10. We are the children of tomorrow.

lessons.title: Translate These Cultural Phrases
lessons.contentHTML:
1. The Anolle unites our families.
  2. Knowledge is the seed of power.
  3. The tribe protects its children.
  4. Labor builds the future.
  5. The tea court restores harmony.
  6. Truth must be spoken with respect.
  7. We rise through cooperation.
  8. Justice belongs to all.
  9. To teach is to love.
  10. Our strength comes from unity.

lessons.title: Translate These Philosophical Phrases
lessons.contentHTML:
1. Time is the echo of life.
  2. Every voice is a fragment of creation.
  3. The mind shapes the world it sees.
  4. To know the self is to free the soul.
  5. Light and shadow are one motion.
  6. The purpose of existence is renewal.
  7. Love is the bridge between worlds.
  8. The universe breathes within us.
  9. Truth has no owner.
  10. Life seeks balance in all things.

lessons.title: Translate These Visionary Phrases
lessons.contentHTML:
1. The Lumeran nation shall endure.
  2. Let wisdom guide our governance.
  3. We build cities for the unborn.
  4. Freedom demands responsibility.
  5. No one is above the covenant.
  6. From labor, dignity arises.
  7. The markets feed our civilization.
  8. Our surplus becomes inheritance.
  9. May Lumera shine beyond the stars.
  10. A nation is a dream made real.
üìù Optional: Record yourself reading both the English and your Lumeran translation aloud for fluency training.
